About me

I'm 19-years-old student of Warsaw University of Technology.Faculty of Automatics and Robotics .Personally I'm from Belarus but last 2 years i live and study in Poland.Right now I finished my first year in University.I'm very enthusiastic ,optimistic and very open-minded.
